name: Lack Of Love
description:
Lack Of Love:

you play as a  character that wants to save the world from the chaos, so he found out that the lack of love is what causes the chaos so he went on a journey to find love.

this game is my first game jam: Mini-jam,

all the game assets besides the music and some SFX are made by Makram which is me.

Music / SFX from zapsplat.com (royalty free)
